short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates alternate text for images using the GPT-4o model from OpenAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alt Text Creator is a browser extension that generates alternate text for images using the GPT-4o or GPT-4o Mini model from OpenAI. You can right-click on any image and select "Create Alt Text" to generate the text, which is then copied to your clipboard. Alt Text Creator can also use a custom local server with an OpenAI-like API, such as LM Studio.

You must supply your own API key from OpenAI and be on usage tier 1 for the extension to work. Alt Text Creator uses the Low Resolution mode in the API and local caching to reduce the per-image processing cost. The current pricing is available on OpenAI's website: https://openai.com/pricing#:~:text=Vision%20pricing%20calculator

This browser extension is not affiliated with OpenAI, LM Studio, or the creators of any AI models. The icon uses images from Bootstrap Icons.
